menu.title: iTones
menu.description: Welcome the the Campus Jukebox Manager. These pages allow you to control what the Campus Jukebox plays out on air. This includes editing the playlists, requesting tracks, or scheduling the playout of pre-recorded material.

menu.title: Manage Playlists
menu.description: The Campus Jukebox maintains a list of lots of different playlists. Use this page to make them do cool things.

menu.title: All Playlists
menu.description: Access all playlists, whether archived or not!

menu.title: Request Track
menu.description: Want to hear a song played right now? Why not request it?
